member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.IISIntegration.IISDefaults
member.summary: String constants used to configure IIS Out-Of-Process.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.IISIntegration.IISHostingStartup
member.summary: The to add IISIntegration to apps.
member.remarks: This API isn't meant to be used by user code.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.IISIntegration.IISHostingStartup.Configure(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IWebHostBuilder)
member.summary: Adds IISIntegration into the middleware pipeline.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.IISIntegration.IISMiddleware
member.summary: The middleware that enables IIS Out-Of-Process to work.

member.param: The next middleware in the pipeline.

member.summary: The middleware that enables IIS Out-Of-Process to work.
member.param: The next middleware in the pipeline.
A token used to coordinate with the ASP.NET Core Module.
Whether websockets are supported by IIS.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.IISIntegration.IISMiddleware.Invoke(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpContext)
member.returns: A that represents the asynchronous operation.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IISOptions.AutomaticAuthentication
member.summary: If true the middleware should set HttpContext.User. If false the middleware will only provide an identity when explicitly requested by the AuthenticationScheme. Note Windows Authentication must also be enabled in IIS for this to work.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IISOptions.AuthenticationDisplayName
member.summary: Sets the display name shown to users on login pages. The default is null.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IISOptions.ForwardWindowsAuthentication
member.summary: Used to indicate if the authentication handler should be registered. This is only done if ANCM indicates IIS has a non-anonymous authentication enabled, or for back compat with ANCMs that did not provide this information.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IISOptions.ForwardClientCertificate
member.summary: Populates the ITLSConnectionFeature if the MS-ASPNETCORE-CLIENTCERT request header is present.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.WebHostBuilderIISExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for the IIS Out-Of-Process.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.WebHostBuilderIISExtensions.UseIISIntegration(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IWebHostBuilder)
member.summary: Configures the port and base path the server should listen on when running behind AspNetCoreModule. The app will also be configured to capture startup errors.
